Scenario: Casual Chat.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Hi, how was your weekend?<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

(Roleplay) "It was relaxing, thanks. I read a book. How about yours?"

(SoftSkillSensei Note: Good interaction. You asked a clear question/statement.)<|eot_id|>
